amendment.description: An amendment numbered 134 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the salary of Vincent Munster, Chief, Virus Ecology Section, National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A076) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 268, 1 Present (Roll no. 675).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A076) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 268, 1 Present (Roll no. 675).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
